Right on both counts Gordon...The book is:

STUDIES IN KYO GOTO
Kasahara Ko=
ju, Akimoto Shigeo (1988)
A unique text for presenting written survey in bo=
th English and 
Japanese of the waki-Goto schools, the fifteen branch famil=
ies of the 
mainline Goto masters.  Tosogu are shown full size with enlarge=
d, 
detail photographs of inscriptions.  This English translation also 
ext=
ends to the captions and descriptions accompanying each plate.

Picture and=
 complete description at http://satcho.com/Tosogu.htm

ation of the Japanese sword as art.
